title: 84/17/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1983 concerning the implementation by the United Kingdom of certain measures to adjust capacity in the fisheries sector pursuant to Council Directive 83/515/EEC (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1983
concerning the implementation by the United Kingdom of certain measures to adjust capacity in the fisheries sector pursuant to Council Directive 83/515/EEC
(Only the English text is authentic)
(84/17/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The measures which the United Kingdom intends to take to implement a financial aid scheme for measures involving temporary and permanent reductions of production capacity fulfil the conditions for financial contributions from the Community.
This Decision shall not apply to national aid referred to in Article 12 of Directive 83/515/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1983.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 290, 22. 10. 1983, p. 15.
